title: Steal the Sacred Idol
content:
can simply put a chest next to the idol, put the idol in that chest, then add it to your inventory. If you wait after you solve the ritual issue with Kagha, it will become much easier to steal the idol. You can just walk up to the idol while hiding with a Dex character. Then move the idol out of the altar and enable turn base mode to pick it up then walk away.

How to unlock Steal the Sacred Idol
